menu

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • menu.Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TuiInterface

    public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
implements TuiInterface
    Saves a list of MenuItems.
    Author:
    AJ Behncke

      • Menu

        public Menu(java.lang.String menuFile)
     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        menuFile - String containing path to file with menu items and prices, one item name and price per line, separated by spaces.
        • item1 price1
        • item2 price2
        • etc
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file isn't found I assume?

    • Method Detail

      • readMenuFile

        public void readMenuFile(java.lang.String file)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads file at given path and filename, and saves the items listed in it. (Overwriting existing menu items)
        Parameters:
        file - Path to and name of file to read from
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file isn't found I assume?

      • saveMenuFile

        public void saveMenuFile(java.lang.String file)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Saves file with current menu. Formatted the same as the way it is read.
        Parameters:
        file - The file path and name to be saved to
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file isn't found I assume?
